title: Act of a person of unsound mind
text: Nothing is an offence which is done by a person who, at the time of doing it, is, by reason of unsoundness of mind, incapable of knowing the nature of the act, or that he is doing what is either wrong or contrary to law.

title: Punishment for murder
text: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death, or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.

title: Punishment for rape
text: Whoever commits rape shall be punished with rigorous imprisonment of not less than seven years, but which may extend to life, and shall also be liable to fine.
